name: awesome-mac
description: ï£¿ This repo is a collection of awesome Mac applications and tools for developers and designers.

data.title: Reading and Writing Tools
data.des: *Applications to edit text, I suggest the open-source editors*

items.title: Hackable text editor for the 21st century made by GitHub.
LibreOffice is free and open-source software office software. Software is tested and used daily by a large and devoted user community.
Open-source Markdown editor with an interface like Chrome.
Date-focused note taking app for both planning and documenting your projects.
Free and open-source e-book computer software application suite which runs on multiple platforms, allows users to manage e-book collections as well as create, edit, and read e-books.
Keep tabs on your favorite website and RSS feeds from your Mac's menubar.
Read CHM documents on your Mac.
The official IDE for Android, based on Intellij IDEA.
The most powerful and complete Mac file renaming application on the market.
Regular expression editor.
Free, open-source, native Apple OS X app for testing HTTP/REST endpoints.
HTTP proxy / HTTP monitor / Reverse Proxy that enables a developer to view all of the HTTP and SSL / HTTPS traffic between their machine and the Internet.
A tool like grep, optimized for programmers.
Lightweight JavaScript UI library for creating mobile webapps that behave like native apps.
Powerful version control with a gorgeous interface.
Powerful, performs operating-system-level virtualization.
Application for creating, designing, editing and browsing SQLite 3 database files.
Great Mac OS X picture and photo editor, built for humans.
First all-in-one cross-platform tool for designing and prototyping websites and mobile apps.
Work at the speed of sight.
PNG image assembler/disassembler app.
Free instant messaging application for Mac OS X. Connect to AIM, MSN, SMPP, Yahoo and more.
Fast email client. For both Mac OS and iOS.
Free FTP, SFTP, WebDAV, S3, Backblaze B2, Azure and OpenStack Swift browser.
Comprehensive and professional data recovery tool for most cases.
Cross platform tool for quick and lossless video and audio trimming using ffmpeg.
Lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility.

data.title: Cloud Storage
data.des: *I recommend using online storage with Mac clients*

items.title: Cloud storage backup client that supports AWS, GCP, DropBox, and more.
Makes typing emoji faster and easier using Slack-style shortcuts.
Web browser with an emphasis on privacy and speed.

data.title: Translation Tools
data.des: *(Or you could just use the Mac OS built-in dictionary)*

items.title: Refine your english
Me: "Please alert me whenever anything is persistently installed." BlockBlock: "You got it"
Personal IPSEC VPN in the cloud.
Clipboard manager for Mac OS X.
Allows you to control web based media players (SoundCloud, YouTube, etc) and some native apps with the media keys on Mac keyboards.
Archive tool supports ZIP, TAR, TGZ, TBZ, TXZ (new), 7-ZIP, RAR.
Most advanced screen mirroring software receiver for Mac, PC and Xbox One.
Nice todo app.
Award-winning app which boosts efficiency with hotkeys, keywords, text expansion and more. Search your Mac and the web, and be more productive with custom actions to control your Mac.
Managing window size and position in OSX.
Cross-platform password management tool.
The first dual-pane file manager to integrate features from Sublime Text.
Hold the â-Key to get a list of all active shortcuts of the current application. It's as simple as that.
Multifunction utility to verify disks and files, run cleaning and system maintenance tasks, configure hidden options and more.
A great video game console emulator, supports many different emulators in a single application. (e.g. Sony PSP, GameBoy, NDS and so on)
Provides Remote access across multiple machines.
Preview plain text files without or with unknown file extension. such as READMEãINSTALLãCapfileãCHANGELOG...

data.title: Third Party App Markets
data.des: If you come across websites offering pirated software or cracks, please post [HERE](https://github.com/jaywcjlove/awesome-mac/issues/17). We love apps, but only authentic ones. :)

items.title: The best apps for Mac in one suite.
GUI client for Homebrew. Install, check or remove apps, no command-line needed.

data.title: Mac App Download Sites
data.des: *Here are some of the major software download sites, there are a number of OSX Mac software sites*

items.title: I personally recommend this. This is a platform where you can compare apps side-by-side, you might get an idea by seeing other users recommendations. Please contribute if you find an application from this list!
Learn about getting the most from your Apple technology with focused topics and workflow guests.
